name: Tensorgrip® 53 High Strength Spray Contact Adhesive
description: Tensorgrip® 53 High Strength Spray Contact Adhesive is an all-round general purpose contact adhesive that performs many standard adhesive applications. These include bonding rubber, veneer, foam, fabric, most plastics, cool duct insulation, acrylic, leather and fiberglass. TensorGrip® 53 is compliant with stringent Californian VOC regulations and is therefore guaranteed to be safe for your workplace and customers. Tensorgrip® 53 has two special features: TensorGrip® 53 is resistant to solvent based lacquers used in the veneer coating process, and it bonds difficult rubber substrates such as EPDM.
